long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This feature acts as your personal assistant, diligently recording every action you take on the Copart and IAAI websites. Whether you're searching for vehicles, placing bids, or managing your account settings, the Action Recorder keeps track of it all. This allows you to review your activity history effortlessly and ensures that no important steps are missed.
